entries: When you hit with an unreliable weapon, instead of adding an ability modifier to damage rolls, you deal an extra {@dice 1d6} damage of the same type.

This magic weapon deals an additional {@dice 1d4} damage of its type when it is used to attack a beast with a swimming speed. Any beast damaged in this way remains pristine and fully intact for the sake of cooking and consuming.
You cannot knock a creature out with this axe. When you reduce a creature to 0 hit points with the Undertaker's Axe, you chop off their head, or another equivalent body part, if any.
